channel.title: Introduction on Learn every aspect of programming
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Learn every aspect of programming

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction The beginning Welcome. This website is for those who want to learn how to code. First time coding? Don’t worry. It will teach you everything from A to Z. Programming is a tool. The code will respond to every order you have. Some might use it for fun, and make games. Some might use it to make convenient apps. Some might use it to build weapons and kill people.

item.title: Basics
item.description: Prog-A-to-Z Basics The basics you have to know, no matter the language.
